name: Hilda

builds.name: Standard
builds.description: A Main DPS unit that wants to stack normal attack damage via advancements and matrices.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: Tap normal attack to enter aiming mode. Hold normal attack to fire continuously, up to 40 rounds. Each shot deals damage equal to 11.4% of ATK + 1. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or hitting an enemy's weak point, knocking them down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

skills.name: Turret
skills.description:
Enable turret mode and fire large energy orbs, each dealing damage equal to 213.3% of ATK + 11 and launching the target into the air. Become immune to hitstun and control effects while setting up the turret.

Cooldown: 3.5 seconds.

skills.name: Arctic Beam
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, remove all debuffs from the wielder and fire an arctic beam upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to 329.2% of ATK + 17 and inflict a 3-second freeze effect. Also reduce the target's frost resistance by 50% for 10 seconds.

weapon_type.name: Ice Shell
weapon_type.description: Fully charged weapons will freeze the target for 2 seconds and leave it frostbitten for 6 seconds. Breaking the ice shell causes additional damage equal to 111% of ATK. While frostbitten, the target's weapon charge rate is reduced by 50%.

advancement: Every successful normal attack increases damage by 1% for 2 seconds (stack up to 15 times). Increase ammo count to 60.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 10%.

Within 10 seconds of switching to the weapon, increase damage of normal attacks and shatter by 30%. Increase ammo to 80.

Cooldown: 25 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 20%.
Reduce cooldown of normal attacks while in turret mode to 2 seconds.

Within 10 seconds upon switching to the weapon, increase damage of normal attacks and shatter by 60%.

Cooldown: 25 seconds.

traits.name: Pedal to the Metal
traits.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by 7%.

traits.name: Full-Speed Drifting
traits.description: When Hilda uses a vehicle, increase speed by 10%.
